1094968774019567619.text: 17/ It facilitates a future where all assets are tokenized and accessible to everyone in an equitable way without rent-extracting middlemen. We are incredibly proud to be part of their journey.

1094968772052639745.text: 16/ Donut helps onboard more users into this powerful technology ecosystem today and paves the way for retail investors into an open financial system tomorrow.http://time.com/5486673/bitcoin-venezuela-authoritarian/ …

1094968770941075463.text: 15/ As we have seen in many cases in the tech start-up world before, Donut has the potential to move from being a specialized player in a niche (cryptoassets) into a leading asset manager of the new world.

1094968769296904193.text: 14/ Eventually everybody will become financially included ,  independent of domicile, wealth and regulations that currently prevent most of the world's population from participating in our financial system.

1094968768193806336.text: 13/ As the usability and security of the parallel open financial infrastructure grows, more and more traditional assets will become tokenized and move onto the new infrastructure.

1094968766830649346.text: 12/ The legacy infrastructure used by banks, brokers, asset managers and others in the financial industry will not be suited for these new kinds of assets and financial products.

1094968765702381569.text: 11/ Early versions of these assets include NFTs in gaming and collectibles, programmable securities (new forms of financial contracts) and self-enforcing securitized debt and derivatives. For a full list of decentralized finance applications, see here:https://github.com/ong/awesome-decentralized-finance/blob/master/readme.md …

1094968763856969728.text: 10/ Blockchains and crypto enable completely new kinds of assets: programmable money and digital assets with unique capabilities that move on an open, trustless and efficient infrastructure (public blockchains).

1094968762728632320.text: 9/ Think: value exchange on an open protocol  -  similar to information exchange on the email protocol  -  instead of value exchange between walled gardens like traditional banks.

1094968761080254464.text: 8/ Besides enabling easy crypto investments, we believe Donut will plug into a much bigger vision. Donut provides convenience, trust and accessibility to the digital asset market. Cryptoassets will only be the vanguard for a new open financial system running on pub blockchains.

1094968759939403776.text: 7/ Moreover, we have been impressed with the execution the Donut team has shown since they started. The founding team, consisting of @theneelpopat, @jabderrachid, @dan__spooner and @lehrjulian, is one of the most complementary we have seen in the Fintech/Crypto ecosystem so far.

1094968758890831875.text: 6/ Donut solves this problem in an great way resembling N26s powerful "Banking by design" approach. In FinTech, trust is key and one way to build it is through design and transparency. The team's commitment to the latter via blogposts reminds us of @Lemonade_Inc.

1094968757011861505.text: 5/ Many of our non-crypto friends approached us in the past two years asking: How much should I invest in crypto? What should I buy? And where? We believe these questions are important but poorly serviced so far.

1094968755866746880.text: 4/ Among the top 100 cryptoassets at least 80% are sub-quality investments, to put it mildly. Therefore, an easy and safe access point to cryptoassets for retail investors is valuable and important.

1094968754109403136.text: 3/ @trydonut enables retail customers to invest in digital asset portfolios tailored to their personal profile (risk appetite, age, net worth, income etc.) from their mobile phone in a playful manner.

1094968752859500545.text: 2/ We are happy to be part of the journey this great team has ahead of itself. Read why we are so excited in our thesis on medium or below. Threadhttps://medium.com/@EarlyBlockVC/investing-in-donut-6ae2a952fcde …

1083718331826401281.text: 12 Congrats to the whole team @N26 @valentinstalf @MTayenthal @patkua @MSchilling__ @alexx_weber @georgie_smalls @nicckopp @akarshsanghi @Freddy_Waller @danielschlossfr @dennismuellr @MartynaWojna @alinko__malinko @MusinaRares @LukasKlinser @daniel_endler @caludio @faouriH & more

1083718329947381760.text: 11 The valuation might seem high to many. However, I hope to have shown that N26 is greatly capable of turning new funding into growth by expanding into new markets, improving the product significantly and filling the right marketing channels with $. This is a great success!

1083718328605204480.text: 10 I am very much looking forward to shared spaces, both as a user but also as an observer of N26's success. I believe it will have a big impact on growth as it (finally) adds same-sided network effects to the product. In other words: A true reason to ask your friends to use N26.

1083718327019687936.text: 9 Marketing 2: N26 seems to have found efficient and scalable distribution channels paired with better brand recognition. It is a nobrainer to spend more money on marketing as soon as the unit economics turn positive (Simplified: CustomerLivetimeValue - CustomerAcquisitionCosts).

1083718325790752768.text: 8 Marketing 1: While it is true that with a bigger customer base that grows by word of mouth, growth (in absolute terms) accelerates, I doubt that this was the big effect. My assumption here is rather that N26 has put to work the Series C money in a very efficient manner.

1083718324435980288.text: 7 Product 2: The big product launch on the user side was N26 Spaces (cool subaccounts). While I am sure Spaces significantly impacts engagement and AUM, I'm not sure it had a big impact on growth yet. However, this will come with shared spaces (shared accounts) --> referrals.

1083718323169308672.text: 6 Product 1: In the last 12 months, N26 had two major product improvements that changed the growth trajectory. KYC improvements are likely to have increased conversion rates significantly, for example by having more ID document types being accepted.

1083718321743249409.text: 5 Market exp 2: N26 additionally launched € accounts in Den, Nor, Pol & Swe. Although the TAM is limited by the € accs, it is a clever move as N26 leverages the same tech infra and reg environment to onboard plenty of early adopters. Momentum playhttps://twitter.com/n26/status/1060102011214020614?lang=en …

1083718320489152512.text: 4 Market exp 1: N26 entered the UK this year in October. As this had been in the works for a while, N26 had built itself a significant waiting list that helped the momentum at launch. I assume this has been a decent contribution in Q4 of 2018.https://n26.com/en-gb/blog/the-beta-launch-of-n26-uk-begins …

1083718318316507136.text: 3 According to N26, they tripled their customer base in the past 12 months from 750k to 2.3m. The obvious question is: How? In my start-up world view, growth can come from market expansion, product improvements or marketing spend. Let's analyze.pic.twitter.com/8HaHjTCLZ7

1083718316655591425.text: 2 I want to share some thoughts on the recent growth that led to this valuation. Pls take all of this with the caveat that I used to work at N26 and am thus obviously biased. All of what I discuss here is my own analysis on publicly available information.https://n26.com/en-de/blog/n26-series-d-funding-round-2019 …
